mng: emptiness, void, abstract theory or guiding principles, empty or unoccupied, diffident or timid, false, humble or modest, (of health) weak, virtual, in vain

exm.mng: to imagine, to make up, fictitious, theoretical, hypothetical, (computing) to emulate, virtual
what is true and what is false, (to get to know) the real situation
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood), heat exhaustion
